artist: Artist: Sebald Beham; Artist: After Barthel Beham
description: bare breasted crouching woman at left, holding her PR breast to the mouth of a bearded man seated in front of her, with shackled ankles; woman has her PL arm around shoulder of man; man leans against column; text on column and at bottom: "CZINMON" at bottom, "ICH LEB VON DER BRVST MEINER DOCHTER" at right
inscription:
Lettered at lower right: CZINMON and on the column at right: ICH LEB VON DER BRUST MEINER DOCHTER

on back in pencil: (various numbers)
title: Cimon and Pero
